import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { http } from '../../axios' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import EditIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Edit' function ViewAddress({ reload }) { const [viewAddress, setviewAddress] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { http.get("address") .then(res => { setviewAddress(res.data) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }, [reload]) return (
{ viewAddress.map(data => ( )) }
Name GSTIN Email Phone Address Edit Delete
{data.name} {data.gstin} {data.email} {data.contact} {data.address}, {data.city}, {data.state}, {data.country}, {data.pincode}
) } export default ViewAddress
